column5: Hey  I want to tighten the throttle of my older 15 hp Johnson.  Its a 1980/81 motor.  It runs fine, just that when i take my hand off the throttle it slows down.  Its kind of a pain when i am trolling for salmon and have to take my hand off the motor for a minute and I lose my speed.  Does anyone know how to fix this?  Thanks Anders
